articles.description: If you're just here for the conforming loan limit news, $726,200 is the number for 2023.    Does this mean no one can get a mortgage for more than $726,200?  No.  The conforming loan limit is the maximum amount that can be guaranteed by Fannie Mae and Freddie…
articles.content:

articles.author: Megan Henney
articles.title: US home prices tumble in September for third straight month - Fox Business
articles.description: Mortgage rates that have doubled over the past year are sapping demand from the housing market, which saw prices decline for the third month in September.
articles.content:
Home prices declined again in September as higher rising mortgage rates
 sapped demand from the housing market.
Prices slid 1% nationally in September from August, the third consecutive monthly dec… [+2405 chars]
